definitions.definition: A looking inward ; specifically, the act or process of self-examination , or inspection of one's own thoughts and feelings ; the cognition which the mind has of its own acts and states .

main_definition: ( psychology ) A looking inward ; specifically, the act or process of self-examination , or inspection of one's own thoughts and feelings ; the cognition which the mind has of its own acts and states .
secondary_definitions: ( object-oriented programming ) Clipping of type introspection .
